rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed with minimalist Brutalist elements, featuring exposed concrete and raw textures to welcome guests.

A spacious living area with a blend of luxury and functional design. The room features large windows for natural light while respecting Vastu principles by aligning the seating area with positive energy flows.
The dining area is integrated within the living space to maximize utilization of the floor plan. It features a robust concrete table and seating arrangement that complements the Brutalist aesthetic.
The kitchen incorporates modern luxury elements with an open concept layout, ensuring efficient workflow while maintaining safety standards.
A comfortable and private master bedroom designed for a bachelor pad. It includes built-in storage solutions and ample natural light.
The library is a quiet retreat featuring bookshelves integrated into the wall structure and a reading nook that aligns with Vastu principles for knowledge flow.

openings.description: A reinforced concrete door designed in Brutalist style to enhance security and aesthetics.
Large window placements are strategically positioned for optimal natural lighting and ventilation. Their placement respects Vastu norms by allowing light from the east and south.
The balcony offers a private outdoor space overlooking the living room area, designed with safety railings made of robust material in line with the Brutalist aesthetic.
